title: Greek Island Private Pool Suite Luxury in Seaside Milos
description:
On a cliffside overlooking the Aegean Sea, the five-star Milos Cove is an architectural marvel on one of Greece's most unsung islands. Welcoming guests aged 13+, this sleek, stylish resort wows with suites and villas with private pools, a spellbinding cliffside infinity pool, the authentic Pathos Restaurant offering Mediterranean and Greek flavours, and the Obsidian wellness spa with its holistic alternative therapies.

It's not hard to see why the lesser-frequented island of Milos is a favourite of the locals. Start with the Papafragas Caves, where crystal-clear waters meet towering cliffs. Wander through the lunar-like landscapes of Sarakiniko Beach, explore sea caves and enjoy snorkelling at Kleftiko on a guided boat trip, or wrap up your days amid the authentic charm of Plaka, the island's hilltop village with its whitewashed buildings and tavernas.
